column2:
"Looks like someone dragged something past here.
Someone small, judging from the footprints."

"It seems like they were in a hurry, though. Running from something, maybe.
It couldn't have been us, though."

"I wonder if that means they've cleared out of these
parts and won't be back? I wish they'd make it a
little easier to find them."

"But this is no time to complain! I told myself I
wouldn't stop looking 'til I found them, and I plan
to back that up."

"Sorry, <%me>.
Do you mind coming with me for just a bit longer?"

"これは……何か引きずった跡、かな？
小さな足跡も見えるし、あの子たちの
痕跡みたいですね。"

"でも、慌てて逃げたような
痕跡にも見えるですね、これ……
何もしてないはずなのに。"

"……もう、このあたりには
居なかったりするのかなあ……
出てきて、くれないのかなあ……"

"……ううん、弱気はだめでした！
諦めないって決めたんです！"

"<%me>さん
ごめんなさい、もう少しだけ
付き合ってください！"
